title: Sweden is horrible
creator_credit: Wedel Films, Radio Sweden and Karsten Wedel
brief_description: Swedish “sin” is better known throughout the world than Swedish steel, to judge by the interest shown by many foreign publications. This film will either help to confirm preconceived notions on this subject or, perhaps, give you ideas about greater sexual equality.
